books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: The lives of two couples converge unexpectedly.
books.name: THE LONGEST RIDE

books.author: by J. D. Robb
books.description: Lt. Eve Dallas searches for a young man who murdered his parents; by Nora Roberts, writing pseudonymously.
books.name: THANKLESS IN DEATH

books.author: by Catherine Coulter and J.T. Ellison
books.description: A Scotland Yard chief inspector teams up with two special agents from the F.B.I. to hunt for an international jewel thief.
books.name: THE FINAL CUT

books.author: by Nelson DeMille
books.description: An elderly priest, recently escaped from an Ethiopian jail, is joined by two journalists in a search for a holy relic.
books.name: THE QUEST

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: Jack Reacher is thrown into jail on trumped-up charges and must clear his name.
books.name: NEVER GO BACK

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: A woman’s life is upended when she discovers a letter from her husband she was not meant to read until after his death.
books.name: THE HUSBAND'S SECRET

books.author: by Sue Grafton
books.description: A homeless man inexplicably leaves $600,000 to Kinsey Millhone.
books.name: W IS FOR WASTED

books.author: by Richard Castle
books.description: The N.Y.P.D. homicide detective Nikki Heat and the journalist Jameson Rook search for the former C.I.A. station chief who ordered her mother’s execution.
books.name: DEADLY HEAT

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: An imprisoned ex-lawyer schemes to exchange information about who murdered a judge for his freedom.
books.name: THE RACKETEER

books.author: by Jen McLaughlin
books.description: A young woman meets a Marine at her first college party, and her life is turned upside down.
books.name: OUT OF LINE

books.author: by Robert Galbraith
books.description: A detective investigates a supermodel’s suicide; by J.K. Rowling, writing pseudonymously.
books.name: THE CUCKOO'S CALLING

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: An innocent college student falls in love with a tortured man with particular sexual tastes; the first of a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES OF GREY

books.author: by Thomas Pynchon
books.description: In 2001, a fraud investigator and Upper West Side mom looks into a suspicious computer security company.
books.name: BLEEDING EDGE

books.author: by Dan Brown
books.description: The symbologist Robert Langdon, on the run in Florence, must decipher a series of codes created by a Dante-loving scientist.
books.name: INFERNO

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL
